metadata.title: CVE-2020-15648 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Using object or embed tags, it was possible to frame other websites, evenif they disallowed framing using the X-Frame-Options header. Thisvulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78 and Firefox < 78.0.2.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
